ARABIC: وَإِن تَدْعُوهُمْ إِلَى ٱلْهُدَىٰ لَا يَسْمَعُوا۟ وَتَرَىٰهُمْ يَنظُرُونَ إِلَيْكَ وَهُمْ لَا يُبْصِرُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: If you call them to guidance, they do not hear. You see them looking at you, yet they do not see.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: When you call upon them for guidance, they do not hear. When you think they are looking at you, (in fact) they cannot see."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And if you were to call them to true guidance, they will not hear; and you observe them looking at you whereas they have no power to see.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (Muhammad), if you invite them to the right guidance, they will not listen to you. You will see them looking at you but they do not really see.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And if you call them to guidance they do not listen; and you (Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him) observe them looking towards you, whereas they do not perceive anything.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And if you call them to guidance, they hear not and you will see them looking at you, yet they see not."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And if you invite them to guidance, they do not hear; and you see them looking towards you, yet they do not see.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: If you call them to the guidance they do not hear; and thou seest them looking at thee, unperceiving.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And if ye (Muslims) call them to the guidance they hear not; and thou (Muhammad) seest them looking toward thee, but they see not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: If you call them to the right path, they will not hear you. You find them looking towards you, but they do not see you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And if ye Call them towards guidance they will not hear and thou wilt behold them looking at thee, but they see not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: If you call them to guidance, they will not hear. You see them facing you, but they do not see.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: If thou callest them to guidance, they hear not. Thou wilt see them looking at thee, but they see not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And if you call them to guidance, they hear not and you will see them looking at you, yet they see not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: If you call them to guidance, they will not hear you. You see them looking towards you, but they cannot see.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And if you call them to guidance, they will not hear. And you see them looking at you, yet they do not see.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And if you invite them to guidance, they do not hear; and you see them looking at you while they do not see.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [7:198] And if you call upon them, that is, the idols, to guidance, they do not hear; and you see them, that is, the idols, O Muhammad (s), staring at you, looking toward you, as a person looks, but they do not perceive.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And if ye (Muslims) call them to the Guidance) to the Truth (they hear not) nor answer because they are not living but dead; (and thou seest them) Muhammad (looking towards you) with their eyes open as if they are looking at you, (but they see not) because they are not living but dead.
